content.detailedDescription:
I have seen ufos on four occasions, all recent and in the same general county. after this most recent sighting i searched more online and found this site. i now have decided to document all my sightings, starting with the one from tonight

first, a little information about my area and what kind of events were going on today, saturday 08-17-2013. i live in oakland county michigan and it is the day of the "woodward dream cruse" (which is kind of a weekend long event, but today was the main day). this is a very large event in this part of the state and about 1.5 million people gather up and down woodward ave (which stretches through lapeer, livingston, macomb, oakland, st. clair, wayne counties) to watch tons classic cars from around the world cruse the strip. so as you could imagine, there was quite a bit of commotion on the streets along woodward.

now, to begin my story, at about 8:45 pm i had to run to work to drop off some files for a co-worker. while driving south on i-75 i first see something odd in the sky (will have separate report for this). was amazed and kept looking for it, or anything weird in the sky. i turned onto m-59 south, continuing towards work. by about 9:15 pm i had arrived at work having only noticing airplanes and the first few stars, planets and/or satellites that begging to appear as the sun was setting lower on the western horizon.

i left work fairly quickly getting back to my car by about 9:25-9:30 pm. my car had not been sounding (or feeling) the best while driving high speeds on the highway so i had decided to skip i-75 and follow m-59 to pontiac and try to stick to the lower speed streets on my way back home.

it was darker now, and i could see a searchlight (the kind used at an event to attract people from a distance) flashing into the sky from the pontiac direction to the west of me in the distance. i reach pontiac after not too long, and see police cars with their lights on directing traffic for the woodward dream cruse. i was planning on taking dixie highway from pontiac to get back home, but traffic down that way did not seem like something i wanted to be stuck in. i worked my way down backstreet detours until i reach walton blvd.

i was heading west on walton when i noticed an object in the distance just above my visible southern horizon. i was an object that just looked like a line that was sequentially flashing blue and white lights. (appeared as a blue light that started to the left of the object and sequentially moved step-by-step to the right of the object, with the previous blue sections slowly turning white as the blue light moved to the right, until it reset and started back from the left (meaning, the blue didn't sway back and forth, but went from one end *left* to the other *right* and once it reached the end *right* it almost immediately started again from the left.)

while driving down walton, i tried to see if the object was moving in any way. with the occasional group of trees or buildings blocking my view, i was getting my best views of it while i was passing the lakes to my south (first creger lake, then upper silver lake, followed by silver lake then finally school house lake). at first i thought it was motionless and was just hovering there, but then it began to look as though it was moving slightly higher on the horizon, and possibly slightly west. then again, it was hard to tell.

i kept wanting to stop and get a good look when passing by a lake that gave me a good view, but i didn't want to just stop in the middle of the road. finally i found the perfect place to park and get a good look. a genesis credit union parking lot directly across the street from school house lake. wide open view of the southern night sky. i get out of my car to see better while grabbing for my cell phone (old with horrible picture quality and doubted it would pick up what i had been seeing, but was worth the try.

as i stepped out of my car facing south i was astonished to no longer see what i was before, but something much different, something that was even more awe inspiring. a large red-orange glowing orb of light slowly hovering higher on the horizon and to the west (same direction i thought the blue-white object might be moving). from my point of view it was just below and to the right of the moon, moving to the up and right direction.

this object was either considerably bigger, closer to my location, or both. it was large enough that i would say it appeared to be about 1/3 the size of that nights moon, but almost appeared to give off an aura that made it change in slightly larger and smaller. i don't know if this was a different object all together or if what i had seen earlier turned into this.

i now have my cell phone camera out, centered on the object (which is in the middle of my perfect line of sight, with no obstructions anywhere near) and i am trying to see it on the screen of my phone, with no luck (crappy resolution camera). i quickly try going into the settings of my phone to make sure it is set for night time pictures, and had the highest resolution (which it was already on) this took no longer than 10-15 seconds to do, but as soon as i look back up the object had completely vanished. with how slow this object was moving, i should have been able to look away for a very long time and it still be in sight. as a rough estimate i will say it should have stayed in sight for 15 mins or so, maybe more.

with so many people at the woodward dream cruse, someone else had to have seen this.
content.summary: Driving west on walton, observed blue-white strobing light toward southern horizon. stopped to observe. was now seeing bigger glowing red-orange orb. vanished.

content.detailedDescription: This event has been going on over a 5 year period perhaps even longer we need some professionals to come and investigate
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: This event has gone on for quite some time over a period of 5 years and it needs to be stopped or investigated

content.detailedDescription: Took a look out of my kitchen window at approximately 11:30pm, saw 3 of the same lights that i witnessed earlier in the evening. all moving in unison and glowing with a pulsating reddish-orange color. very flame like. i did not witness this second sighting alone. there was one other person with me who also thought it very strange. we both thought that these were paper lanterns, but not so sure. i am from the philadelphia metro area and live within the local international airport approach path.  these lights were at an altitude that could very easily disrupt incoming planes.  i am noticing that there are sightings of this description from both my local nj area all the way through ohio and wisconsin.  if anyone has any idea what these lights are please let me know!
content.summary: 3 glowing pulsating red orbs fly by 3 hours after first sighting!

content.detailedDescription: Co-worker and i saw the same strange orb as reported several weeks ago in the same place same colors, object hovered for a bit then slowly move away heading west.  the colors were orange and yellow would get brighter then get dimmer it would move slowly up and down then just slowly moved on.
content.summary: Bright orange yellow light hovering

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my friend were outside. we saw three lights flying in a ^ formation. heavy cloud cover, they were bright enough to shine through. we expected at least 24. we have crude cell phone vidieo that just showslight. they were red. they seemed to form a triangle a bit more to the south west but we could not see do to tree cover.

they match the other reports with red pulsating lights. we found this link over twitter,
content.summary: Red pulsating lights. 24

content.detailedDescription: Witnessed an orange-red orb approach from the southeast.  it seemed too bright to be an airplane.  it came at a slow pace, then seemed to ascend maybe a thousand feet in height off the ground.  the object then slowed down to almost a standstill.  seemed to hover but still progressed very slowly.  the light that was being emitted then dialed down.  kind of like you can change the brightness on some lamps in your house.  after the light dialed down, the object picked up a whole lot of speed and continued to the north progressively getting faster and faster.  then lost sight of it behind a house.  myself and my wife are witnesses to this event.  it happened too fast to grab my phone to take a picture or video.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Orange-red orb came from the southeast at a slow pace. hovered for 15 seconds, then sped up and continued to the northeast

content.detailedDescription: We were in the back yard waiting for the iss pass. right before the 21:52 pass, there was a red glowing "thing" at about 60 degrees going from the ne to the nw (the opposite direction of the iss). it went straight across, then up, the lights went out and it continued nw - it was shaped like a stealth fighter - like an odd trangle.  as far as we know, the air national guard at toledo express doesn't have any stealths. later at about 22:45 - 22:50 another one passed overhead, followed by 4 more - all of those were at approx 90 degrees, directly overhead. none of them made a sound.  when the second set came over, i got the camera and grabbed some video, but it's not really helpful, just looks like a red circle going across the sky.
content.summary: Red glowing objects overhead

content.detailedDescription: I stepped out to get some air and saw a light approach. only observed about a minute of object's flight. a reddish pulsing light moved slowly from the south to the north.  not able to ascertain the altitude, but it seemed to be rather low.  it looked like a paper lantern but speed was constant and there was no deviation in direction.  the light seemed to flicker like a flame. i lost visual of light behind tall trees.  came online to see if anyone else has reported seeing it.  the report from orlando, fl is very similar to what i witnessed.
content.summary: Observed slow moving red/pink pulsing light moving from south to north.

content.detailedDescription: It was almost 9pm and i was taking out the trash when i looked up and saw a bright red glowing object ascending at a decent rate of speed from the south west and moving up into the sky toward the north east. it moved from clear skies to a very thinly clouded sky. i observed as it slowed down and appeared to almost stop and hover for a while as it waited for a second similar object to catch up with it. then they both entered the thin cloud layer one after the other and disappeared. i looked but they never did emerge from out of the cloud even though it was surrounded by clear skies. i called to my wife to come out and look. my neighbor heard my calls and she came out as well. after a minute or two, we all noticed as two more objects appeared, traveling toward the same path but from a slightly different direction. these two were traveling very close to each other,far too close for normal planes to travel. the were also very bright and red. no other color was seen. they did not pulse like a strobe but rather had the texture of balled fire, similar to a red flare except that they were ascending and not descending. these two entered the same cloud and disappeared as well. finally, another minute or two and two more brightly glowing red fireballs, one behind the other and off to one side climbed into the sky as they disappeared as well into the small patch of thin clouds. i am convinced they were under their own power and moving at will. i have never seen anything else like them before. they should have emerged from the thin cloud cover as it opened back up to clear sky but they were all gone, all six of them. no sound was heard at all. the way they flew, it seemed as though they could almost stop but then move very quickly. they flew like they had somewhere to go. i believe they shot straight up but i can not say for sure. if they were some kind of jet, you would think six of them would have made some sort of sound but they moved very quietly. i don't know what they were but they were very odd and unusual and unusually bright. my neighbor tried to take a video with her cell, i don't know if it came out or not.
content.summary: Total of 6 bright glowing firey red balls of light moving in same direction shot into very thin cloud layer and vanished.

content.detailedDescription: Went outside to let dogs out and saw bright red light over house at the same time dad saw them from the front window. first there were 2 then three more. the were all in a straight line going from east to west and seemed to disappear in the night sky. there was no sound and we could tell the difference between airplanes flying over head and these things. are they drones? it was too far in the sky to see a shape, but lights were very noticeable. very bright red. we would like to know if anyone else saw them. i have never witnessed this before. it did not seem like 1 object since they appeared one at a time. the red lights went in a straight line and disappeared one by one in the sky. sorry if this isn't informative enough, never saw this before. have some video but not that great and have to figure out how to download.
content.summary: 2 people saw red lights 2 at first flying in a row then 5 in total

content.detailedDescription: I was driving  west on a hilly road north of ionia heading toward m66. at the top of a hill i saw a silver, reflective object sitting in the road maybe 1,000 ft ahead. i thought it looked like it was sitting off the north side of the road. it appeared to have a red light flashing on the top, however the reflecting light was very bright and made it difficult to tell. i thought it was a police car. i lost sight going down hill and saw it again maybe 30 secs later when i crested the next hill. this time i saw it for a longer period of time and it appeared to be sitting stationary in the middle of the road. i was closer but having a harder time telling if it had a flashing red light. i still thought it was a police car and wondering if it was blocking the road. it was between me and 66. there was no road to turn off on between me and 66. i went down the hill again and when i came up it was gone. then i came up the next hill and i was where it had been sitting. i'd guess it was roughly a minute between where i lost sight of it and when i reached where it was sitting. i saw nothing a police car would be blocking the road for and i had a straight, clear view down the rest of the road (about 2,000-2,500 ft), all the way to 66 and saw no cars. if it turned off, it would have to be in someone's driveway and i didn't see it in anyone's driveway. i suppose it is possible it could have reached the end of the road and turned by then. i was still trying to figure out where the police car went when i saw a big metal pole barn on the south side of the road with all it's doors open. in it was a big black truck with red tail lights (i thought they were glowing) sitting in the barn. i thought "oh, i must have seen that truck". within a few seconds a tree blocked my view and when i saw the barn again, it was full of green farm machinery and a man was standing out front who i didn't see before. no black truck, nothing that looked like a black truck, or even looked like red tail lights. at this point, i was a little freaked and started thinking about the 'police car'. the state police vehicles are dark blue and i was not close enough to any city that it was likely to be their car. also the light i saw only flashed red and not blue. i would hate to report a police car sighting but this seemed odd to me.  i can give a more accurate location, but i don't want to submit it publicly.
content.summary: Silver, reflective object  with a red light sitting in the road. thought it was a police car but disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
Event time:  appoximately 8:55pm est on 8/17/2013

1.) location: i was sitting on my patio cooking burgers on our grill
2.) observation:  i noticed the peculiar colored and flashing object as it was passing over me.  
3.) first thoughts:  i looked for the tell-tale signs of airplane lights, but there were no wing lights, gear lights or any typical airplane lights whatsoever.  being a trained pilot, i knew this was not a blimp or airplane.  i knew within seconds that this was something different, and ran outside my patio to take some pictures.
4.) description:  the ufo was a spherical/elliptal shape of flashing pulsating reddish/raspberry light.  there was no pattern to the flashing, and seemed random.  it was moving slowly from east to west, perhaps se to nw, or thereabouts.  an airliner passed above it coming from mco... typically airliners at this point are probably 8000-10000 feet up, and seemed to cross its path, so it was lower than that, and would estimate it was around 3000-5000'.
5.) feelings:  excitement.  i have only seen 1 other ufo several years ago, and was excited to see another one.  i immediately ran outside my screen to take some zoomed in pictures on my cellphone before it disappeared...  i was able to get 3 in, as it traveled to the e/ne.  i tried to get my family out after taking these pictures, but in the time it took for them to get out, the object had already disappeared completely into the distance.
6.) lost sight:  i lost sight of the object as i was trying to get my family to join me in seeing this object.
content.summary: Red/raspberry pulsating orb travelling in straight line from e to w

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were camping above payson, az at a campground on august 10, 2013. we were sitting around our campfire talking when a woman and her two kids walked by. she was talking about the sky and pointing to the stars. so we naturally looked up. the sky was full of stars and absolutely crystal clear...No clouds!

my husband pointed to one of our satellites flying quickly across the night sky from the west to the east. i saw the satellite and commented about how fast it was moving. then 30 seconds later, my husband pointed at another satellite moving in the same trajectory. "impossible" i said. "that's too close together, they could crash into each other". 

as we were watching the second object flying across the sky, suddenly it appeared to be "falling" to earth in mid flight, then it stops its decent and emits a huge white pulsating light for about 10 seconds, then soars straight up into the sky directly above us and disappears...No longer flying on the same trajectory path as the first satellite. 

my husband and myself looked at each other in disbelief. we both said at exactly the same time, "it looked like it was falling!!" i knew it was a true physical observation, because when you experience something that could be life threatening, your heart skips a beat...Mine skipped several beats that night when i saw it fall. it looked like it was falling directly down on top of us in the campsite. 

this ufo was approximately the same size and appearance as the previous satellite and had a glow (like the satellite) until it dropped out of that orbit and flashed a huge white light that night that dwarfed the other stars in the sky. both my husband and i truly thought it was going to crash onto our campsite until it turned off the light and immediately soared up into space. why did that happen so just my husband and i observed the object? no one else seemed concerned or was talking about it in camp. it was all very strange, but we both agreed, that was no satellite!!
content.summary: A satellite flew over & in 30 secs this ufo flew in same trajectory, suddenly dropped towards earth then soared straight up into the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I found myself asleep on my deck,(winter).  when i woke up i saw the back
end of a ufo that had black and neon red spheres attached to it, ascending
away from me. i felt dazed. i went inside to my bedroom and slept for about an hour. the ufo appeared to be long and skinny. it was about 20 feet long and 6 feet wide. it was predominately black. there were no leaves on the trees at the time. so i had an unobstructed view of the ufo.
the object was approximately 300 feet away when i first saw it. it was
daytime at about 4:45pm. the sky was overcast. because we live out in the
country we tend to see ufo's off in the distance often. we use night vision goggles.  we also have many different colors of orbs.  the dog gets
aggressive and barks at the orbs. the orbs are both inside the house and
outside. we also have paranormal events such as knocking,bed shaking, vibrations in my body and shadows. due to all the anomalous activity, i went to the doctor and had a cat scan of my brain done. it was normal.
on july 4, 2012 i took photos of orbs that were in my yard. the leaves on
the tree were actually scourched. around august 1, 2013 i had another
sighting of 10-12 ufos twinkeling very high in the sky.
content.summary: The ufo was long and skinny, back end was black and neon red lights

content.detailedDescription: Looked like a star withe a short horn shaped trail under.  object was moving extremely slow to the nw.  the trail under would suggest it would be moving up or east.  it didnt look like a plane w the exhaust trailing it.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Looked likw a star with horn shaped trail comming from the bottom.  object gradually moving left--not forward or straight as the trail would suggest.

content.detailedDescription:
Clear, calm evening, moon in sw, and many stars.  we enjoy stargazing and it was a perfect night for that, but we hadn't intended to.  

witness #1:
it was 9:55 pm because i had just checked on kids before 10:00 news; i was on second floor.  without my glasses on, i glanced out a bedroom window and saw a large red light in the east.  thought nothing of it because we have high altitude jet traffic, but did think it was odd that it was so red/orange, bright and large.  within a minute, witness #2 came upstairs and told me to put my glasses on and 'look'; i was shocked by what i saw.  i knew it wasn't a jet and hoped it wasn't a ufo.  i was uncomfortable and uneasy about what i was seeing.  it took me a couple hours to go to sleep because i was upset.  and i still am upset when it gets dark.  this event has freaked me out!

i saw one large red/orange fuzzy orb (about size of golfball - 60x star) in the se, about 60 degrees from horizon.  and three smaller red/orange orbs (about 30-40x star) in an isosceles triangular pattern (in general but the lengths fluctuated).  they were in the east and lower, about 45 degrees from horizon.  all of the orbs were very bright, very intense.  the larger orb stayed separate from the other three orbs, they seemed to hover or move slowly, no sound and no trail.  after 4 minutes or so, the smaller orbs started to become smaller but still bright; then they weren't present.  the larger orb remained in the se for about another 30 seconds, then started to get smaller but still bright, and finally no longer visible.  i couldn't get a perspective to determine if the larger orb was closer to us as compared to the smaller orbs.  i checked my watch after the last orb faded and it was 10:00. 

i didn't notice any drastic or dramatic movements between or by the orbs.  however, they did move about some (3-4 inches from my perspective) but didn't dart.    

while the lights were present, i looked around the sky in their area and did not notice any jet activity.  for the next couple of hours, i'd look out the window every few minutes.  as i mentioned this really shook me up.  about 10:30 or so, i saw 3-4 planes (not jets) in the area where the lights had been.  and then i saw a meteor traveling from north to south; that was out the same eastward facing window where i watched the lights.   

don't know if this is related or not.  we have indoor house cats.  around 9:30 pm, one cat was sitting by the sliding door, which faces east (the direction we saw the lights), and started to growl and get agitated by twitching her tail.  she does this (growling and twitching) when the neighborhood tom is in the area, but he has not been by in several months.  i didn't think anything of this and so didn't get up to look outside.  the other cat was in the middle of the great room, about 5 feet from the tv, which was off, and she started to stare at the tv.

witness #2:
witness #2 was on first floor and was turning off house lights to go up to bed.  witness #2 saw the lights before #1.  #2 went to close the sliding glass door and saw brighter than normal lights out to the east.  there were three orbs in a triangular formation and a fourth clearly maneuvering to join them.  there was some jockeying around to get into a rough formation.  #2 went outside to further observe and watched the orbs for about 3-4 minutes, then went inside to have #1 look out the window.

the orbs were fuzzy, there wasn't a clear shape.  they were bright and the light pulsated.  as they moved away, the reddish-orange light faded to white.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Four fuzzy orbs; very bright and reddish-orange and faded to white as rapidly moved away

content.detailedDescription: Entered my back yard at approximately 10:00pm and observed a triangular shaped object to the n-w of my yard moving slowly and quietly toward the south and then stop. i had watched the object for approximately 1-min when i turned to my attention to my a/c unit for no more than 5 seconds then returned my attention to the object to find that it was gone. i observed the sky in all directions but could no longer see the object.
content.summary: Travled south slowly, then hovered, i looked away for no more than 5 second then looked back and it was gone.

content.detailedDescription:
From six lights 3 lights in wishbone formation botom one bouncing right one spinning just really want to know if any one else on that night reported the same sightings

thank you
freddy
content.summary: From 6 lights to 3 lights seen

content.detailedDescription:
Driving northon 220 /bassett forks, driving to roanoke,va for date,
saw bright like in sky/hovering, pulled over asap and there were 3 teens already pulled over to look up! we were afraid , it hoverd over the steepele of a church that i have all ways liked, i am a military a aircraft identifier/ artillery and aviation. this air craft did not make any sound . just blinding white like that is not used on us aircraft.It was not a spot lite to land. it moved fromside to side 2 times and then just took off toward 220 south, same route as rode,we jumper in our cars and took off as fast as we could. i drove  120 mph ,s to get away for 40 miles to roanoke,  it would be nice to find the three kids/teens/adults now that pulled over at the furniture company/store  that nite andseen the ufo over the church.I maybe thought it was project from tech, but no!   it was not from this world,it made not even sound over cars still traveling nt/south.   bassett,va siteing near golf course.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright lites 1.Billions of wattage.. like b-2 bomer/float/no sound/take off mach 1-no sound

content.detailedDescription: I was flying to laguardia from manchester, nh on delta flight 6035. the flight was from 6-7 pm that evening.  it was a clear evening and i was sitting on the left side of the jet in a seat by itself. the aircraft was in sight of the airport at all times since we were in the approach pattern. since i had never seen nyc from above, i was constantly looking out the window and was observing the awesome view of nyc, lga, "statue of liberty", "911 memorial" and so forth.  i observed this spherical object out the left side of the aircraft as we were in our approach pattern. it was 200-500 ft. below us and 25-50 degrees away from the bottom of the aircraft.  the speed of the aircraft was unknown or if the object was stationary since we were traveling at approach speed. upon observing the object, i was unsure of it's nature. my guess it was an observation device over nyc or an approach marker for the aircraft. it just caught my eye and my attention.  it appeared to have the ability to blend into the surroundings. this, by any means, does not need to involve the pilots of the aircraft since they were involved in the approach sequence. i did state "holy !@#$ what was that". i just thought it was cool to observe something like that for such a short period of time.  this will not bother me if nothing comes about from this experience.
content.summary: Traveling from manchester to laguardia saw object while flying over nyc

content.detailedDescription:
Seem to have filmed around 8 glowing orbs that all came together to eventually forming a triangle

have video evidence...
content.summary: Dont really know what to say...But have video evidence!

content.detailedDescription:
I'm [name removed/cms/tg] i was walking to my parents house headed south of 224th st on o.K. hwy (orting/kapowsin hwy) at approx. 10:30-11pm. i was on the phone with a friend. (100 yds from while i was observing a very large orange ball of light hovering about 15 miles of my position. after a few minutes a billiards triangle shaped object swoops in as if sliding sideways to a decellerated speed on its edge. making it possible to clearly make out its outline and position of large soft white lights at each corner with a larger soft red center. i was quick on the draw already snapping pic while relaying what i was seeing to my friend and had the phone video camera rolling as it rolled flat never made a sound. i then noticed that there was another further south and then another etc. i counted 8 total all hovering at what appeared to be the same altitude. the triangle moved in an l shaped trajectory headed south toward the orange objects and so low it passed behind a grove of trees. when it emerged it appeared to be a helicopter. i don't mean i mis identified i mean looked like a white bottomed blue lit skid rail with a red rear prop light and white nose light which was not decernadble through the camera. it traveled about a mile before it banked right on its side and dove like a high diver into the trees again no sound and only about 3.5-5 miles away probably over meridean st. the orange lights would occasionally move in unison a short distance. the triangle never emerged. i had walked to within 150 ft of 240th and o.K. hwy when i was shocked to catch a third set of craft moving fast and low together almost the same way a roller coaster's carts look if there were only 2 carts and you could only make out two bright pulsing red lights in the loww front fog light position. with a single pastel blue pulsing light in the rear higher than the fronts significantly. they were silent, very low and directly south of me headed west to east. they were the smallest and shortest sighting. the entire event happened over a 1 mile stretch of road in the area that i spent the better part of 27 years. i have watched these skys from this area my entire life and only experienced something this life changing once before. it should be noted that imediately after the second craft dove into the trees there was an intense static in the air and the smell of ozone was that of an impending rain squall. however, there wasn't a single cloud in the sky nor mossquito to swat. please feel free to contact me for any additional info via email or phone. i have attached the video pictures of the triangle craft and balls of light. i assure you that this is legitt as i have spent every night listening to art bell and the coast to.Coast am program while watching the rural sky and have waited for the chance to share an important event. i believe this is that event. thanks for being available to us. [name, phone number and email removed/cms/tg]

cam00049.Jpg 193kb downl
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Observing multiple firey orbs, during which a triangle swoops down. and changes shape then 2 additional ufos appear that are different from the first 2

content.detailedDescription:
About three years ago (2010) my wife and i were driving west on i-64 in southern indiana just across the river from louisville, kentucky. there had been a very strong thunderstorm with a lot of rain but the rain had just about stopped and on the indiana side the sky was curiously clear. 

we had just entered a section of the interstate that was under construction and there was only one narrow lane to drive in with not enough room to pull over.  suddenly i saw a black colored ufo with no shine on the south side of the freeway about 200ft. in the air at about the 10 o'clock position and it was just hovering while slightly wobbling and rotating with a small red light going around it.   it was around 30 ft. in diameter.

i don't think there was any sound - just a swishing sound but that could have been my tires on the wet road. the bottom of the craft had something like diamond shaped window panels on the bottom and a very bright halogen blue light shining from the panels.  just before it went over the car i saw a tapered black pole that curves over the top of the craft and possibly one coming up from other side that i couldn't see. they didn't connect though but there was a gap about 2 feet or so between them. 

i asked my wife "what is that?" she had to reposition herself slightly because i was driving and she was in the passenger seat. after a few seconds it traveled slowly to the north side of i-64 and even though it was still sprinkling rain she stuck her head out the window to get a better view of it. at that point i could not see it because it was about 2 o'clock high. 

it was there just a few seconds and then it went back to the south side and i could see it better now. it slowly enveloped itself with water vapor (?)  it disappeared and then reappeared in the direction we were traveling and seemed also clone itself with 6 other craft evenly spaced following us down the interstate. they or it followed us for around 20 minutes. 

when we got to the illinois state line we were both totally exhausted and slept (or tried to) in the car at the rest stop for a few hours. 

we also had a cell phone but no camera and the phone didn't have a camera in it (darn-it). 

we have mentioned this only to a very few friends and i have been back there but no other sightings. 

mufon sightings in indiana exist but none like ours. i tried to report this to mufon three years ago but for some reason when i did it would not forward and the report disappeared. 

this is a strange story but true.  both of us saw it!
content.summary: A black colored ufo with no shine on the south side of the freeway about 200ft. in the air at about the 10 o'clock position and it was just hovering while slightly wobbling and rotating with a small red light going around it.   it was around 30 ft. in dia

content.detailedDescription: I lived on carmel valley ranch golf course in carmel, ca. i was the end house backed up to a pond and the 3rd hole at carmel valley ranch golf course. a large appx 100ft hillside banked the pond and golf hole. this is a very dark area at night with only a few homes providing light...No city lights. i could see satellites pass overhead clearly from my lawn during the night. this is a very active ufo area but the incident that follows proved to me beyond a shadow of a doubt extraterrestrials exist. i was about to head to bed at appx 11pm when i took my dog out for a final potty stop. holt road was my street and the place of the sighting which runs appx north to south. i first saw the blue phoenix bird like ufo while looking north with the hillside behind me to the south. the object was darker blue in the middle with lighter blue semi solid outlining lines. the lighter blue outer edges had some white in them as well or maybe it was just the light itself emanating that made it appear as white. i first saw the object at about tree top hight appx 100 ft away coming directly down holt ave from north to south. the speed was relatively constant at appx 5 mph. absolutely no sound whatsoever. it was slowly descending and heading directly toward me. i was completely frozen in my place. i did not feel any physical constraints but mentally i was very confused as to what i was looking at. i don't remember being fearful but i was not happy to see it coming my way. i feel like the object was intelligent enough to know i was there and stop appx 20-30 ft away and hover about 5-10 ft off the ground. i would guess up to this point we are about 20-40 sec into the experience. my dog was standing right besides me just as transfixed as i was. zero barking or any noise coming from her at all. we both stood their motionless. i am somewhat confused as to what happened next as the phoenix bird (think nazi symbol of the phoenix shown in all ww2 propaganda videos) simply moved back ever so slightly and vanished. i say that i am slightly confused about the end bcd i can't really remember it going it was just gone if that makes any sense. i went inside and laid down tossing and turing for a few hours wrestling with what i had witnessed. i know what i saw but have no idea how to make any sense of it other than another intelligent life form. i witness quite a few other strange anomalies during my 2 years at the above location but nothing anywhere  near as unexplainable. i have quite a bit of psychological questions which pester my brain in regards to this incident. i was exhilarated to have seen the phoenix but i later had to question why i did not try and interact as i always thought i would do if something like this ever happened. i do believe the object was intelligent, aware of presence, and able to read my fear. i now unequivocally believe
content.summary: Blue aura phoenix like bird straight path towards me with descent & hovering no sound

content.detailedDescription:
It was september 1991 and i (19 years old at the time) was living at 101 tannery lane in fulton, ny with my little brother and parents. 

one evening i was sitting right beside my bedroom window playing video games with my little brother (7 years old at the time). the window was about 1 foot away from my head. it was dark outside...So it must have been after 8 p.M. 

suddenly, i noticed a green ("slime green") light/orb...A ball of light outside the window about the size of a volley ball come into view in the corner of my eye, from the right side of the window...About 1 foot away from my face!  startled, i pushed my brother back away from the window. my first thought was that someone was shining a flashlight into my bedroom window.  

the light did not hurt my eyes and i thought it was absolutely beautiful to look at. i was not afraid....I was in awe. the orb moved slowly towards the middle of the window in one straight line, then slightly circled in small circles as if it was trying to focus or "looking in on"  my brother and i...Then it stopped completely for about 2 seconds. it was definitely some kind of intelligence behind it and we felt like we were being watched.  then all the lights when out inside the house. the electricity was gone. i called my mother who was watching tv in the living room. after about 2-4 seconds, the orb flew up and out towards the left of the house. i looked out the window immediatelly and it was gone. it did not light up the night sky nor did i see any trace of it anywhere. it had just disappeared. 

 ...The electricity went right back on after this.

my dad and i immediately went outside to see if there was anything there and we found nothing. no trace of anything. 

a few days later, -during the day-, my little brother saw another orb/ball of light at the same window. i was not present to witness this event. 
(my brother will report his story to you in his own words in the next few days with some video he has made of this incident.)

we have carried our experiences with us all these years because we did not know where to turn. we tried telling our story to family members and close friends, but we were pretty much laughed at. we dismissed everything, thinking it was ball lightning, but today we know it was definitely not ball lightning. my brother and i are now living in germany and since 1991 have not had any more encounters or experiences of such kind.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Glowing orb outside my bedroom window

content.detailedDescription:
I am nightly observer.
object flies northeasterly and has repeated this five nights in a row. object is an extremely bright white light and when viewed through binoculars seems to have a red area frontward.When viewed with the naked eye appears as a ball or orb of bright white light.  as an nightly observer the area is ripe with unknown objects. there are what i call "flashers" stationed in the sky nightly and some seem to mimic known constellations like ursa major and minor. they are plentiful and when viewed flash red, white, green. they appear to adjust themselves in the night sky and appear to "dance" as though they are trying to maintain position. have been watching the night sky for four + years and have witnessed many unusual events . at this point i have become accustomed to the "experiences" and search for answers. would like to add that i view the objects with stargazer binoculars and the objects moving are definitely not planes, helicopters,flares.
content.summary: Brilliant glowing moving object

content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside my home around 3:00am looking up into sky and first noticed a white, star like object (object #1) gliding through the sky coming from the east. soon afterwards, another object that was triangular (object #2) came gliding from the opposite direction and caught my eye even more so due to it`s brightness and solid yellow color. i then realized that both objects were heading directly for each other and i thought to myself that i was going to see them crash. the objects eventually met up, stopped in the sky, and object #2 began to revolve 360 degrees around object #1 with the upper point of its triangular shape facing object #1 the entire duration of this. after the revolution, object #2 began to glide away until out of sight behind the trees. object #1 glided away for a moment, suddenly shot higher into the sky at a much faster speed, and stopped suddenly in place. i rushed inside to grab a camera to at least try and get a photo of object #1 while it was still in the sky but once i came back outside, the object had completely dissapeared. i believe that there`s no objects that can perform what these had done, whether man-made or cosmic phenomenon.
content.summary: Two objects gliding towards each other in sky come together and one revolves around the other.

content.detailedDescription:
I was at the empire docks in coos bay oregon stargazing.  i had my six year old nephew and we were just watching the stars.  i looked at several stars and watched one flashing repeatedly flash.  as i reached over to grab my binoculars it disappeared!  i turned and looked to the northwest and saw another star that was flashing brilliantly over the north bend airport.  i grabbed my binoculars and looked and to my surprise it was a triangle ufo!  you could see the outline of the craft.  the outside triangular lines were green and white, and the top of it was red!  it would tilt back up so that all you saw were the colors.  a few minutes later it would tip back down showing you the shape of the craft again.
as soon as i saw it i was amazed as i always am when i see one.  i am always in awe at their sight.
it was still in the same spot when i left as i had my six year old nephew and he fell asleep in the back seat.  so i took him home.
content.summary: It was triangular in shape.  it hovered and to the naked eye it looked like a star that was flashing red, green and white, with my binoculars you could see a triangle ship with green and white around the triangle and red on the top flashing

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were on our balcony short before 9:40pm having a cigarette. the balcony faces the east. clear skies and stars were clearly visible. we tend to stargaze while we're smoking, so it was pretty easy to spot this object. our eyes had time to adjust with the night sky. at first glance you could assume it was an aircraft but we shortly realized it wasn't a commercial craft or anything we'd seen before. the unknown object came from the west and moved towards the east, it had a pulsating white light and drifted side to side. absolutely no sound and the speed of the object was very slow. the object didn't move in a stable pattern. we watched it change direction to the se. the feeling was strange and we didn't know how to feel about it.. almost like a joke had been played on us. we are constantly looking at the night sky when we're outside, we know the difference between a commercial craft, helicopter..Etc. kinda dumbfounded. the object after about 5 minutes of clear view disappeared behind a building towards the se. we haven't found any sightings of this particular object.
content.summary: Constant white glow, drifted side-to-side.

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 3:05 am, saturday, august 17, 2013, i went outside to get something out of our car. as i got to the end of the driveway and looked across the street, due east, in the direction of the space coast, i saw an oval object at about 30 degrees above the horizon. it was traveling in what appeared to be a southerly direction along the coastal region. thinking that i should get some kind of point of reference regarding size and such, i held out my hand at arm's length. the ufo was gliding along very slowly, in a straight path, taking about 2 minutes to travel what measured at arm's length to be between 10 and 12 inches. the size of the craft, using my thumbnail at arm's length, was about 1/2 an inch. and it was a medium to medium dark raspberry red...Not the tone of red like on emergency vehicle lights, or on traditional aviation lights...And it pulsated slowly. the lighting of the craft seemed to come from within the object, and not from an external light source. it continued along its flight path at what appeared to be the same altitude and direction for the entire 2 minutes that i was able to see it. when it was no longer visible, i came inside, marked this event on my calendar, told my husband that i just saw a ufo and that i had to report it to nuforc and mufon. i called the nuforc hot line, as well,and have now made this written report. please feel free to contact me, if needed.
content.summary: Looking due east, observed pu;sating, raspberry red oval object flying very slowly 30 degrees above horizon, going north to south
